about_the_game:
Welcome Fear Follower! Your mission is to earn reputation for the Cult of Fear Followers by recording evidence of our Sacred Entities. Form a team of up to 4 members to: detect, investigate, record, and review.




Use your video camera's detection system to find the Sacred Entity... but beware! Other lesser entities roam the facility, making the mission even more dangerous.




Once you detect the Sacred Entity, we will show you what evidence you need in order to summon the entity. You must find 3 types of evidence, each combination specific to it's own Sacred Entity. Use your camera to record the evidence so that we may have proof of the Entity's existence.




After you find all the evidence specifically needed for the Sacred Entity, you can summon it. Once summoned, you must record the Sacred Entity itself. When you record the Sacred Entity, you earn the Cult more reputation. Use the reputation you earn to buy new tools, such as evidence gatherers, that unlock new Entities to discover.




All the footage you recorded can be reviewed on your ship's TV.


What're you waiting for, Fear Follower? These entities aren't going to record themselves!

content_descriptors.notes: Minor blood. Realistic atmosphere with horror elements.
